website_summaries.verdict: A fun and super durable mechanical keyboard that will bring your gaming (and ordinary typing) to the next level.
pros: 104-key RGB mechanical keyboard, with Outemu blue switches
Buyers love the ergonomic wrist rest
Comes with a manual, CD, keycap puller, and free switches
cons: Some of these arrived with keys loose in the box or outright broken
Some report issues installing or using the enclosed software

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I've ever hated more than this keyboard is my ex-wife.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this keyboard for 4 months now and I've had two switches fail. They didn't completely fail but became unresponsive 25-50% of the time. This did come with extra switches so I was able to replace them, but I still wouldn't expect them to fail in just a few months. EDIT: Another failed switch in about 6 months. Update: I. Hate. This. Keyboard. Constant issues with the switches, dropping letters in emails, constant typos in messages, unresponsive in games. This is the worst piece of hardware I've ever owned. I'll be buying a different keyboard soon and will make it my mission to steer people away from Redragon keyboards.
customer_reviews.author: Tim D.

customer_reviews.title: Ressponsive Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I initially gave this product 1 star because I could not stop the lights from scrolling and I use this keyboard for work. Redragon customer serevice emailed me several options as remedy so I gladly change my star rating. Since I use this keyboard for work and always snacking at my desk, I wanted a water resistant mechanical keyboard. No encounter with liquid yet but the feel of this keyboard is wonderful. TThe keys stand high and the response is fast. When I type one lettter, that what get. The keyboard is a on the large side. There is no phone number to contact so I deducted a star for that reason. I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Della

customer_reviews.title: Edit: Wonderful customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this keyboard for just over four months. I use it for working at home and gaming. This morning the number/symbol keys 1 - 9 suddenly do not work. I am the bookkeeper for a small business, so not having the symbols is definitely a major problem. They keypad works, but it is extremely inconvenient not having that row of keys working. Had I seen reviews listing this issue, I would not have purchased this keyboard. Edit: The company promptly replaced the faulty keyboard with a brand new one. Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: MARNI STRIKS

customer_reviews.title: KING OF THE BUDGET MECHANICAL KEYBOARDS
customer_reviews.text: For the price who can complain. The keys are a clone of the cherry mx blues. I have another kb with mx blue keys and the difference is very minimum. With the added features on this keyboard offer, hey you can not go wrong. This is a must buy for all gamers and typers that don't mind the clicking noise of the blues. They also offer browns for the ones that hate the feedback. I recommend buying noise suppression rings. The brightness of the KB is quite like the ducky series, not that bright in which will be a favor for those who prefer dimmed lit kbs.
customer_reviews.author: DaBradleys

customer_reviews.title: Red Dragon Kala K557 RGB Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a great keyboard at a very reasonable price. Had an issue where the keyboard would not wake the computer from sleep mode or initiate during start/restart. Had to unplug/plug the USB connector from the computer to wake the keyboard up. Contacted the seller and they promptly provided a firmware update to solve this issue. ***If anyone is having issues with the keyboard not waking the computer from up sleep mode or not initiating upon start/restart, contact the seller or company and obtain the most current firmware for the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Not tremendously impressed, but it is worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Not overly impressed. It's ok and makes a clicking noise but it's not a like a buckling spring keyboard. It has a plastic feel and sound. Minimalist design, I knew that going into it, but you can see right underneath all the keys, and the light filters from underneath it. So for me, it's less minimalist and more just saving money on production costs. Is it worth the price, yes but is it high quality with good tactile feel No, it is not. I can't say it's gaming ability because I don't game.
customer_reviews.author: Jim1960

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Well made
customer_reviews.text: Built like a tank, very well made has some heft to it and I am not the most delicate guy. I have big hands and tend to wear regular membrane keyboards out fast. So upgrading to this mechanical board was a huge improvement. It has the blue switches, so if noise is an issue for you, you may want to swap out with brown or other ones. It does come with a key/switch puller and some sample switches for you. The software that you can download from them works well to switch the color pattern. Overall very happy with this purchase and would highly recommend this board for gamers or anyone that enjoys a mechanical keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Joe H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beginner mechanical keyboard with modular switches.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent mechanical RGB keyboard that has kailh like pcb sockets! This means that you can swap out the switches to customize the board to your liking. Although you can use a myriad of available switches, I've found that Outemu teals work great on wasd, shift, space and control. The replacement of switches also allows you to repair your keyboard for a fraction of the price when the switches wear out-without soldering! The per key rgb per key is also nice for games and the custom color schemes are perfect for night typing. Overall, this keyboard allowed me to eliminate my wrist strain from a membrane keyboard without straining my wallet. It made typing for whatever reason enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Minhsane

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard. The key travel, the resistance, the sounds. It's great for typing OR playing games. I can't think of a single complaint, other than the font etched into the keys makes it hard to read them at lower light levels. I'm a touch typist, so this is really only an issue when using seldom used keys and symbols. It comes with a good length cord and replacement switches. The macro function is a little confusing to figure out... it's not intuitive at all, but it works well once you suss it out. At 1/2 to 1/3 the price of other mechanical keyboards, this little guy is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: L. Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Nice mechanical keyboard for cheap
customer_reviews.text: These are a great deal for mechanical RGB keyboards. They're heavy and appear to be well made. There are on-board commands to cycle through the color options. This is going to sound stupid, but I bought it when it was on sale because my baby likes to smack my keyboard. I know it can withstand abuse because she just smacks it with all her little baby strength, and the keys don't pop off easily (unlike my Razer, which the baby can somehow constantly pulls the keys off of). I've been considering buying a second one for work. :P
customer_reviews.author: Sutaru

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: As someone who never really payed much attention to the keyboard I gotta say, this is a great keyboard. Feels very satisfying to type and game with, solid clicking sounds and the keys themselves are well made with a nice texture. Having waterproof keys is also a nice bonus. There are some nice color effects but overall pretty basic, nothing that's gonna blow your mind but still nice to look at. The "wrist rest" may as well not even be there for all the good it does, you gotta have some tiny hands to be able to use that thing. Overall a great keyboard that I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customerdo

customer_reviews.title: But more importantly to me at least is how satisfying it is to type a single key on and it's pretty damn easy to find the characters some warning how ...
customer_reviews.text: Using it right now to type this, it is very responsive and has some customization on modes and some colour options. But more importantly to me at least is how satisfying it is to type a single key on and it's pretty damn easy to find the characters some warning how ever if you like a more quiet mechanical keybored it tends to be really loud comparatively to other I have use namely my friend's razer. It is mostly due to the keys hitting the molded plastic base making a hard clack and I would recommend if you want it quieter use some bands for the keys or other ways
customer_reviews.author: BakedPotato

customer_reviews.title: Broken F4 Key.
customer_reviews.text: *Update* I initiated a return/refund and they quickly granted it and sent me another keyboard. Every key on this one works, and I am happy with blue switches. *Original* I tried replacing the switch with 3 different switches to no avail. I used an online keyboard tester to see if the key was registering, and it's not. Completely disappointed with this defective keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: notsure

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I don't use much for gaming but for coding/programming, so doing a lot of typing. It is a little loud but in a way the sound is likable. Overall seems solid and keys are well laid out. My biggest issue is with keyboards becoming dirty (partially from my own sweat when spending days typing) and hard to clean. This one seems to have removable keys that can be cleaned, so I may be able to clean it and use it longer. So far it's holding up very well after couple months of use.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid keyboard for the price. It is loud, so I did change out the WASD keys to black switches and put O-rings on all the keys, overall I'm very satisfied though. It's a sturdy, heavy keyboard and feels extremely durable compared to other keyboards I've used. Each individual key can change color, the RGB IMHO isn't very bright though even on the highest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a mechanical keyboard. When i first started looking i researched a bunch a different ones. I received this one a day early that was originally promised and was happy the moment i took it out of the box. I plugged it in an was completely satisfied it was exactly was i wanted and what i was looking for. It is also very clicky with the outemu blue switches. Which was the major reason i wanted this keyboard. Good Job Redragon
customer_reviews.author: sinsangel97

customer_reviews.title: The Back lighting on it is amazing. it looks and feels like a high end ...
customer_reviews.text: Very phenomenal Keyboard, The Back lighting on it is amazing. it looks and feels like a high end keyboard without the hefty price like other gaming keyboards, although i wish the travel distance was just a little bit shorter and the keys were that the keys were brown switches. Other than this i recommend you buying this for a first time Mechanical keyboard user. ( I bought this on black Friday so it was a much sweater deal :D )
customer_reviews.author: Ike

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: No apparent software for adjustment from screen so you have to read and hold down key combinations. Seems solidly built -- sure hope the wasability is real.. Keys have nice click but the touch seems a bit light; keying more positive than usual membrane keys. Limited light choices -- fancy movements but basics not well covered.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Quality Gaming and Typing Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I am not an avid gamer, but It seems to me I'm getting better response time in gaming when using this board over my old cheap one. This keyboard is heavy. It literally weighs like 5 pounds The LED light variations are numerous, and keys can easily be distinguished in the dark. This board seems to me, to be of very high quality. I love the click these keys make when struck. I have always been a key slammer.. These keys have the right amount give to smooth out my overall strokes when typing.
customer_reviews.author: soho

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard lighting changes and cannot be fixed w/Win 10.
customer_reviews.text: In general this is a pretty decent keyboard and it seems to work well. However, I am not much of a fan of the color wave that perpetually sweeps across the key board. If this were one of many options I could pick I would have given 5 stars. But since the color sequence cannot be changed in Windows 10 due to driver issues, I gave only 4 stars overall, and three for ease of use. To be honest, I would probably prefer constant white vs the changing colors I have now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: which is just awesome. I can now say that i recommend this ...
customer_reviews.text: Review update: The first keyboard I got was cracked in one of the corners, and i could not find the software, since the one in the disk did not work for me. After my initial review, the seller contacted me to help solve the issues i was having. Having the replacement keyboard and the working software, i can finally use it as i was intending to. The software allows me to create custom layouts for my games, which is just awesome. I can now say that i recommend this keyboard for anyone looking for an affordable mechanical keyboard. If you experience any issues with your order, just contact the seller. They will be more than happy to help you.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, was not disappointed in the least by this ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, was not disappointed in the least by this keyboard. I was not expecting to like it as much as the namebrand one I used to have, but I actually prefer this one. Been gaming with it for the last four months and I'm very content.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Enter key “pings” after release
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard has great lighting effects and the switches are quite loud and clicky, which I like. Although, some keys, primarily my enter key, emit an audible “ping” when the key is released from bottoming-out. The sound is quite obnoxious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality keyboard for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard is amazing! The blue switches, though not cherry branded, feel very nice and click very well, though there is a small dead spot in the key if you press a key down to the point before it clicks, however that is minor. Have spilled several beverages on the keyboard and it has survived. Also, the keyboard was packed in a box WAY too big for it, but it did survive with no problems. It has an all metal case and comes with good software for rgb customization. Overall a very nice keyboard for such a convenient price!
customer_reviews.author: Acer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value To Price Ratio
customer_reviews.text: I have used /tried tons of "mech" keyboards out there? But this one....is without a doubt the most solid feeling, vibrantly backlit, and featureful one I've purchased......ever! It might not have a USB passthrough or a volume wheel?...but I'm a developer and don't really need that, and the Otemu "blue" switches?....while not as "clicky" as CherryMX Blues....are STILL tactile and responsive. I liked this keyboard so much?...I bought a SECOND one for a family member! If you're looking to go RGB, but don't need a lot of fluff, just a solid, reliable and sturdy keyboard with beautiful backlit effects...and you don't want to spend a lot? GET THIS KEYBOARD!!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie G. O'Connor Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Love the keyboard, its the model up from my last Redragon and it feels classier. The key switches feel great and you can't beat the price for a good mechanical keyboard. The only think I don't like are the preprogrammed colors, most of them are too busy.
customer_reviews.author: Random289

customer_reviews.title: The Clickity-Clack is powerful
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to change the way the lights move using not only the preset conditions, but using the application that can be downloaded as well. My only complaint is that all of the colors kind of blend together for certain choices, like with purple they all generally become a purplish pink but thats probably just how LEDs work. Other than that it is such an awesome keyboard and its always hard to work at any other computer that doesnt have a mechanical keyboard
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: blue switches are LOUD
customer_reviews.text: the build quality was great, response time great. The keys are so loud that I had to turn the volume up on the game. Regular typing on it was making me crazy with the sound. the disk with the drivers was in chinese and did not work. the media controls are not separate and require both hands to mute if a call comes in. great KB if you play with headphones on. and don't type much.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Sites

customer_reviews.title: Excellent keyboard, buttons are solid feeling, haven't seen any problems with the overall use of the keys
customer_reviews.text: Excellent keyboard, buttons are solid feeling, haven't seen any problems with the overall use of the keys. Love the RGB lights. I would recommend this item to anyone looking for a good mechanical keyboard. Item arrived on time and in a very secure package. Easy to install, computer picked it right up, comes with driver disk or you can go to website and download easy to install drivers.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Gift for a friend.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for a friend who works on his computer for hours each day and seems to spill everything in his keyboard. He has purchased one for his wife who has the same issue. Much better than factory keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: JCK

customer_reviews.title: nice sharp clicky buttons
customer_reviews.text: purchased this keyboard to retire my old merc stealth.. the buttons are nice sharp with a loud satisfying clicky sound .. i personally love it.. being my first new keyboard in 13 years it feels great but i only have my past experiance with the old non-mechanical one
customer_reviews.author: Tommy R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Wicked awesome support support staff!
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard seems to be in fantastic condition and was well constructed. I initially had an issue with the driver setup that the Redragon support staff quickly found and corrected. Redragon's keyboard is sturdy, well built, and highly aesthetic while Redragon's staff is equally sturdy, well-organized, and extremely helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Eyres

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard. Deff waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I can testify that its waterproof. Split a cup of water on it. Runs great still. Very cool light patterns on driver. Beware it is a loud keyboard. I didn't know it when i bought it, but i kinda grew on me and i like it
customer_reviews.author: Jacob dipaula

customer_reviews.title: Clickity-Clackity
customer_reviews.text: I love my new click-clacky, wacky dacky gaming keyboard! I also use it for typing emails and such which sound so satisfying! I havent tested if it is actually waterproof yet, I'll update if I have a spill! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Raven Roth

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Fully Featured
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! I'm partial to blue switches, so I'm in heaven with this thing! RBG is responsive enough and looks great, though I have set it to a solid color that matches my machine's theme. The Redragon drivers that come with the keyboards don't appear to work with Windows 10. Somebody said you could get them off their site, but I couldn't find anything of the sort. As far as I can tell, everything is programmable directly from the Keyboard though, so I haven't missed them!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Haley

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I am an old school kind of guy and I love the quality of this keyboard. I do not use it primarily for gaming but typing. In my mind, it reminds me of the old IBM Selectronic typewriters. The LED can be turned off if you like.
customer_reviews.author: Rooty Tooty Fresh and Fruity

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard! I read previous reviews before I purchased this one. The clicky noise is perfect, and I love the ease of use. The color patterns are beautiful, as well. I do type a lot, and I find the keys help with my speed as well as accuracy. Really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: loria

customer_reviews.title: durable keyboard with responsive keys.
customer_reviews.text: this keyboard is rather durable, and well made. The keys are very rsponsive and less prone to double strokes, or key sticks than other keyboards i've used i nthe past. I love the backlit keys as it is easy to operate in low light settings(perfect if you're in a bedroom and your significant other is trying to sleep and you have work that needs finished.) I would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: D. TENNANT

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mechanical keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This keyboard is amazing so far. I've had it for almost a week and I'm loving it. This is the first time I've had a mechanical keyboard and this one is pretty loud, but very satisfying. It looks good and the rgb lights are pretty bright. Warning: This keyboard can be loud because of the blue switches. Be prepared for annoying others in close proximity.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Liamkin

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: I like the function controls and how much smoother it feels than previous keyboard. Response times seem on point and I type faster with it. All I need.
customer_reviews.author: Chris t

customer_reviews.title: Love this key board
customer_reviews.text: I love clicky blue switches on mechanical keyboards. If you do too, then this is a great keyboard for you. The RGB patterns are beautiful, and the software included allows you to customize the lights, very cool! I've seen similar mechanical keyboards for nearly twice the price of this one. I've owned it about 6 months and have had zero issues. Fully recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable keyboard. Less than stellar drivers.
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and still feels like a premium product. There are a lot of presets for the RGB lighting. Software that comes with the keyboard did not work for me. I kept getting runtime errors when trying to install. The two websites I could find that had drivers also wouldn't work. Thankfully it doesn't seem like I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Jed P

customer_reviews.title: Fair for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have red dragon gaming mouse and I like it a lot. I expected the keyboard to give me similar experience but it didn’t. It has a cheaper look and there is volume adjustment keys. It is a fair product given its cheaper price, but if you really want a good mechanical keyboard, buy the razor or Corsair ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 issue
customer_reviews.text: Everything about it is amazing! Tons of color options and easily replaceable keys only problem is the click is annoyingly loud and had to replace due to the complaints of people hearing it over my microphone
customer_reviews.author: JaydenB

customer_reviews.title: Love the mechanical sound!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound of the keyboard it makes me want to work more! I also love the led colors! If you are considering buying a this keyboard, you should buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Nata E.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gaming Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is the best small progamable gaming keyboard! You can customize the LEDs to do an animation! Cool little keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: Alis-Tech

customer_reviews.title: Nice keyboard. Heavy and appears to be well built
customer_reviews.text: Nice keyboard. Heavy and appears to be well built. The color schemes are silly. I just keep it on one color. I can't see how all the flashing and changing can help you play or aid in typing. Gotta have it though:)
customer_reviews.author: E. Impastato

customer_reviews.title: A good keyboard in its price range.
customer_reviews.text: Very loud but that doesn’t bother me as long as I’m wearing headphones. Material quality is good, switches feel good. The options for the lighting aren’t as customizeable as I’d like, but for the price this is a great keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Austin Brady

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The ratio between comfort; weight; style and response is great. Definitively highly recommended. It is a great product...!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesus D. Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: went through countless keyboards spilling something... not this one its solid
customer_reviews.author: Tay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing keyboard! Couldn't be happier. Should have bought years ago.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing keyboard! Couldn't be happier. Should have bought years ago.
customer_reviews.author: nemo435

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard, but loud
customer_reviews.text: Never missed a keystroke yet with this keyboard. Ultimately I bought it to replace my razer black widow in order to save space. The keys are a good bit louder than the razer, but it's a great keyboard. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Braytoth

customer_reviews.title: Best Budget Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Even though I rate it as a 4 star, this keyboard is a well built keyboard. The plastic feels kind of cheap and the feel sometimes feels kind of bad but otherwise, the sound of the blue switches satisfies me very much. The keyboard usually acts out after lots of hours of gaming, but for my first mechanical it was not bad at all
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel, looks pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love it, but it is loud. Each keystroke sounds like a hammer strike. But I don't care; my headset dampens the noise.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Good budget piece
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard came extremely fast and without any damage to the packaging or the keyboard itself, it works great, and i got a little confused about how the backlight works(figured it out). My only real issue of how loud it is on some keys, the wasd is very loud compared to other keys, other then noise its a great budget keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Tyler P.

customer_reviews.title: Gift for 13 year old grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson received this for his birthday and so far has really liked it. Thank you for your fast friendly service.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Nice Clicky Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a gamer, so I can't answer any questions related to this keyboard for gaming purposes. I'm a programmer who happens to like clicky keyboards. I got this one to keep at my daughter's house. I have a Razer at home, and like them both. This one had a better price point. I haven't had it long enough to say which I prefer or why.
customer_reviews.author: dly62

customer_reviews.title: Love the keyboard, but I would like to know how to get these keycaps.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this keyboard for a couple of months now and everything works well. My only inquiry is when it comes to obtaining these specific keycaps to replace the worn out keys from the oil on people's hands. I tried contacting their support with this question but they never got back to me. Anyone have any ideas for compatible keycaps that look and feel the same as these?
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing so much I couldn't have just 1 at work or at home. There is one of these on my desk at both locations. My boss (sits next to me) has the same one.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Buys

customer_reviews.title: Well built keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard feels really well built. I haven't had any problems and the click of the mechanical keys is very satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey Rahe

customer_reviews.title: Buttons stick
customer_reviews.text: After about 6 months buttons started sticking and not working. Tried to clean they still stick. Lights up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Responsive, nice design and COLOR SENSITIVE!!
customer_reviews.text: The design is very sharp and product well built, the lights are very impressive I keep playing with it instead of typing haha. Very responsive, specially for games.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro K

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality. Clickity click click clickers go my blue switches! I bought two. Great responsive keyboards. Game nightly and have been using it for a year.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the gamer in your family
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this keyboard as a Christmas gift for my younger brother. After years of playing PC games with his laptop keyboard, I figured he could use an upgrade. He was not disappointed. For this price I'm not sure that you can do much better.
customer_reviews.author: Limitedmoon06

customer_reviews.title: Good Overall Mechanical Keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this keyboard to have at the office because I like the feel of a mechanical keyboard and do a lot of paperwork and general typing. Keyboard is responsive and the backlighting is a nice touch. Overall, I am happy with the purchase for the price paid. It is my second Redragon keyboard and I would recommend the brand to others.
customer_reviews.author: Demetre Curry

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: My initial purchase resulted in a few faulty LED's and I contacted Redragon support. They quickly sent me a new keyboard to make things right. I am quite pleased with this keyboard and it is a terrific entry-level mechanical keyboard. If you have issues, Redragon support will make things right. Purchase with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Bro after 5 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this keyboard in July and it completely stopped working on me 2 weeks ago so the end of November. It did its job while it lasted but because it only lasted 5 months of giving it 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: anthony m.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it' very good but I can't download the software on Redragon from official website. what's a problem ?
customer_reviews.author: faisal

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this keyboard for 2 weeks so far, but I can say I have no complaints. For the price this has been the best keyboard I could find and so far I personally think is better than my old $90 corsair keyboard. This keyboard even came with a key removal tool and extra switches, nut not just the blue switches
customer_reviews.author: Justin Howell

customer_reviews.title: works very well the rgb is looks great and has many settings
customer_reviews.text: works very well the rgb is looks great and has many settings. the only cons are the keys are a little clicky easily fix by dampening rings, and wish that the rgb could be controlled by an app.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S

customer_reviews.title: Well built, solid keyboard with many RGB features and excellent tactile feel. Great for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing negative so far with the keyboard. Budget keyboard with excellent features and function. Great price point.
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: Key chipped, otherwise great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard feels fantastic so far, overall I'm impressed with the weight of the keyboard and the overall quality, especially considering the price. My only complaint is that one of the keys is chipped out of the box, which is a little disappointing, but everything works so I can't really complain too much about that.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Singh

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this product. Colors and control of colors are nice, feel of keyboard is nice. The problem is that every time the computer comes out of rest mode it's like a key is being held down until I start typing. For this reason alone I am replacing this keyboard and am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: brian l. horle

customer_reviews.title: like the lights i can see key board at nite
customer_reviews.text: like the lights i can see key board at nite. the palm rest to small detachable would be nice . but this way I wont loose it.
customer_reviews.author: joe valadez

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I mainly used this product for gaming and I seriously enjoyed it. Whenever I used it to type I got the satisfaction of a real mechanical keyboard, too. It comes with extra switches (2 red, brown, black, and blue) which is really helpful and the software is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS KEYBOARD!
customer_reviews.text: First mechanical keyboard so I might be bias, but this exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: W. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well for my purchase intention
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mainly because I work at all hours of the day/night- I’m not a gamer. So far, seems to be a great buy. Comfortable to use. I haven’t had the time to work with the programming on it yet though. Just received it two days ago, installed it yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Leann

customer_reviews.title: Clicky and Great Keyboard--Love the RGB lights
customer_reviews.text: So far this is just as nice as the $100 keyboards. Well done. We'll see how it holds up over the next few months.
customer_reviews.author: Deelybop

customer_reviews.title: It works better than i expected
customer_reviews.text: It works better than i expected. Beautiful keyboard with custom key-by-key lighting, typing on it feels consistent in comparison to a membrane keyboard. Only reason it is not 5 stars is because one side of the keyboard doesn't stand upright. This was easily fixed by putting a thick slip of paper underneath the keyboard. Overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: RevengeTech

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and quality
customer_reviews.text: Best affordable mechanical keyboard on the market. A must buy if you are on a budget
customer_reviews.author: William Milan

customer_reviews.title: Can’t seem to find the software for it
customer_reviews.text: The disc that came with drivers doesn’t work. Everything else is great. Keys feel good, lights are good. Even without the software, the keyboard has a lot of settings and customizable options. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: splankoperson1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard. It was cheap, yet feels great and the RGB effects are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I use it at work and everyone wants one. It's very "clicky". Lights are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: K. Houghton

customer_reviews.title: Good Keyboard. Be wary of shipping
customer_reviews.text: Good news: great keyboard, lots of bells and whistles (and RGB capability). Sturdy. Mechanical. Bad news: original order was lost, so I had to order a second to get it in time for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Georges

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love the keyboard, it's more than what I wanted and I have loved using it since I got it. One weird thing is that the extra switches they send you are all different than the ones the board uses, but it's not really a problem, just odd..
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Incredible keyboard, responsive with gaming, no lag time ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredible keyboard, responsive with gaming, no lag time. Keys sit higher on board and are noisy when rapid firing, but other players can't hear it too much over the mic, doesn't interfere with conversation
customer_reviews.author: lsilverman

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute lie when staing this keyboard is "waterproof". I accidentally spilled a bit of coke on the arrow keys and the keyboard completely fried itself, I've had it for not even 2 months yet, highly disappointed and seeking a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Whalen

customer_reviews.title: He has been so happy with it and still goes on and on about ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is very into gaming hardware and this was a keyboard that was on his must have list. He has been so happy with it and still goes on and on about how cool it looks and how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is well made and types very well. The keystrokes are a little loud, but I should have simply checked the color of the buttons ahead of time. Great keyboard for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SmoothedBlock85

customer_reviews.title: Great Overall Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of the keys. Only minor complaint is it is pretty loud. Doesn't really bother me too much, but I get glares from my wife every now and then if I have to do much typing.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Better than my $150 keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Good keyboard for the price prefer it over my $150 keyboard
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mechanical keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 17-year-old son. I didn't want to spend over $100 on a mechanical keyboard that still didn't get great reviews. I bought him the red dragon gaming mouse last year and he really likes it. So I decided to try the keyboard. It is a mechanical keyboard at a very reasonable price. He says it is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of gear
customer_reviews.text: It's a great keyboard. Very responsive. Plus the changing colors just look better then any similar keyboard I've see before
customer_reviews.author: Brett McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Love the profile, the fantastic clickety clackety sound and the lights. I use it at work and it catches everyone’s eye with the snazzy lights. The build quality is solid. Totally worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul G

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: On the right side of keyboard sounds hollow and bigger keycaps sound and wiggle way more than smaller keycaps
customer_reviews.author: Justin Walden

customer_reviews.title: Very very good keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and for the price i stoled it hahaha joking i loved it honestly is the best keyboard i ever had i have 2 keyboards from REDRAGON and this is the best so far i highly recommend this keyboard to any one
customer_reviews.author: Juan Pablo ciscomani

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Amazing keyboard had it for around a week and it’s amazing. For the people saying it’s too loud or it’s not bright enough, it’s amazing and you should really get it
customer_reviews.author: ruben

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize it was loud. But it's great. I love that it lights up very brightly, which is great because I game at night and don't want lights on.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Nice keyboard
customer_reviews.text: It's heavy and feels great. The lights are good. No complaints yet.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and colorful LEDs.. The switches on this keyboard are very nice for an in house maker. Hopefully an all white version of this keyboard will come out in a future iteration!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Fish

product_meta.title: Redragon K557 RGB Backlit Mechanical Gaming Keyboard with Blue Switches, Aluminum Base, Anti-ghosting 104 Keys
product_meta.description:
The Redragon K557 is a detachable mechanical gaming keyboard. 8 PCS additional mechanical switches comes with the package for Gamer DIY

Features：
100% Anti-Ghosting 104，double-shot injection molded keycaps are (RGB) LED backlit. Player can simultaneously click multiple function keys without program error. All the keys are controlled by an independent switch in ways that ensures fast response and extraordinary gaming experience for our players.

Customized mechanical blue switches make it possible for 50 million times keystrokes and fast responsiveness. Mechanical keys can provide an all-around gaming experience for players with medium resistance, nice click, and quick feedback.

RGB adjustable LED backlights offer 6 backlight themes and 18 backlight models. Player can press ‘FN’+ Ins, Home, PgUp, Del, End and PgDn to change as they like.
Support WinXP/Vista/Win7/Win8/Win10

Keyboard Setting:
6 themes switchable backlight colors
18 models backlight colors
4 LED brightness levels
104 standard anti-Ghosting keys
All non-conflict keys; 12 multimedia keys
WIN keys can be disabled when gaming; laser engraved chiclet keycaps

Technical Specifications:
Connector: Gold-plated USB
LED backlit color: Choose between seven colors
Keyboard Size: 17.2x6.78x1.5 inches
Keyboard Weight: 2.8 pounds
Multimedia keys: 12
Material: Aluminum alloy +ABS

Package List:
1x Redragon K557 RGB 104-key mechanical gaming keyboard
1x User manual
1x Keycap Puller.
8x Free Switches for DIY
1x Warranty card

Please Notice: No CD software included, please download from <http://bit.ly/K557keyboard, or contact us directly.
feature_bullets: Anti-ghosting 104 keys RGB mechanical keyboard. N-KEY ROLLOVER: it allows you to simultaneously click multiple keys. The floating keys and blue switches (OUTEMU switch) will give you a great gaming experience with fast response and nice click sound.

Durability: 50 million times keystroke test, small actuation force and short travel make it more durable. Special Double-shot injection molded keycaps never fade Key color. The ABS keys and metal base make if water-proof and can stand a longer time use.
Cool RGB backlight: 6 backlight themes and 18 backlight models allow you to type in the dark. You can adjust its brightness with FN + Up/Down. Arrow Key in any non-breathing mode.
Gold Plated USB interface guarantees efficient and stable data transmission.
Ergonomic design with the palm and wrist rest to prevent fatigue. Supports computer system including Windows10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows XP, Windows VISTA, etc.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars325 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
